question: Which is the world's largest military spender, as per the report of Stockholm International Peace Research Institute (SIPRI)?
explanation: As per SIPRI military expenditure database, the United States is the largest military spender in the world with an expenditure of $611 billion, followed by China, Russia and Saudi Arabia. India has acquired the 5th position as largest military spender in 2016 with expenditure of $55.9 billion for 2016-17.
